articles.title: Indonesian perfumes are having a moment – here are 7 fragrance brands that should be on your radar
articles.author: Tan Wei Lin
articles.summary: Several Indonesian fragrance brands like Alchemist, HMNS, ALT, Etre, The Body Tale, Euodia, and Polka Cosmetics are introducing new and innovative scents. HMNS launched Orgsm and Darker Shade of Orgsm. ALT offers fragrances inspired by global destinations, while Etre draws inspiration from Indonesian locations with its Deux collection. The Body Tale targets a younger audience with imaginative scents like Whisper of Rice.

articles.title: SCADS: The Revolutionary Beer Brand Redefining Strength and Style
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SCADS, a new beer brand, is entering the global market. The brand aims to redefine how consumers experience strength, taste, and identity in beer drinking.

articles.title: KFC Just Dropped a Zinger Bánh Mì That is Certified Smoko-Approved
articles.author: Nick Hall
articles.summary: KFC Australia has launched the Zinger Bánh Mì, a new menu item that is a Kentucky-Fried twist on the classic Vietnamese roll. The Zinger Bánh Mì features a Zinger fillet with Bánh Mì mayo, fresh slaw, and Supercharged sauce and is available at participating KFC restaurants nationwide from November 4 to December 1, starting at $9.95.

articles.title: New Trader Joe's welcomed by eager shoppers
articles.author: Marlene McTigue
articles.summary: Trader Joe's opened a new store in Glenmont, featuring its signature mix of friendly service, international products, and neighborhood charm. The store offers a variety of products from around the world, including flowers from Norway and pasta from Italy, and maintains the company's focus on building relationships with customers.

articles.title: My AI Lazzie encounter: How Lazada's AI makes shopping smarter, faster and more human
articles.summary: Lazada introduced AI Lazzie, an AI shopping assistant powered by Alibaba Group's Qwen, and SmartStack, a feature for combining LazRewards and seller vouchers.  Lazada also deployed four other AI agents -- Refund Agent, Logistics Agent, Product Listing Agent and Marketing Agent -- to enhance the e-commerce shopping experience. The new Product Listing Agent optimized over 13 million listings, saving sellers an average of 11 work hours and increasing page views by up to 180 percent within a week.

articles.title: CJ Freshway officially launches ‘Fresh N', an online food ingredients mall exclusively for restaurant operators
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: CJ Freshway launched 'FreshN', a mobile B2B platform to streamline food ingredient procurement for restaurants.  'FreshN' offers features such as industry-specific recommendations, a catalog of 10,000 items, and next-day refrigerated delivery leveraging CJ Freshway's logistics network. To promote adoption, CJ Freshway is offering discount coupons and shipping discounts to first-time and repeat customers.

articles.title: Phunware Unveils New White Paper Demonstrating $2M+ Annual Revenue Opportunity for Hospitality Leaders  Nov. 3, 2025 21:31
articles.summary: Phunware released a white paper outlining a transformative strategy for the hospitality industry. The strategy aims to increase ancillary revenue and elevate guest experiences through intelligent digital engagement, focusing on capturing guest attention on-site and unlocking post-check-in revenue.

articles.title: 5 pop-up truck bed campers for your next outdoor adventure
articles.author: Dan Teodorescu USA TODAY
articles.summary: Napier Outdoors offers Backroadz and Sportz Truck Bed Tents with features like waterproof floors, multiple sizes, and spacious interiors. Rightline Gear provides a floorless truck tent with a sky view vent, suitable for summertime camping. JOYTUTUS offers a pickup truck tent with a removable awning for sun and rain protection, while Pittman Outdoors provides an EZ-UP Truck Bed Tent, known for its easy setup and wide air vents.

articles.title: From Defining to Discovering, AI Reveals the Human Side of Data
articles.author: Jeremy Fain
articles.summary: Cognitiv is introducing its AI Personas, a service that employs deep learning to generate dynamic audience profiles. This helps advertisers identify deeper, less obvious factors driving consumer behavior, offering a shift from defining audiences to discovering them, ultimately improving targeting and campaign outcomes.

articles.title: This $20,000 Humanoid Robot Needs Remote Human Operators Who Watch You
articles.author: Freedomsphoenix Readerfour
articles.summary: 1X Technologies will launch NEO, a consumer-ready humanoid robot, in 2026. NEO is designed for household chores and can be remotely controlled by human operators via VR headsets when it encounters unfamiliar tasks. The robot utilizes dual cameras and AI to navigate and learn within the home environment.

articles.title: Verizon Promo Codes: Get A Free iPhone, Streaming Services And More
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Verizon is offering promo codes this week that provide savings of over $1,100 on phones, internet, and streaming services.

articles.title: The Best Exfoliating Face Washes Keep Skin Clean, Soft, and Smooth
articles.author: Iman Balagam
articles.summary: The article introduces several exfoliating cleansers from brands like CeraVe, Tata Harper, Caudalie, SkinMedica, Victoria Beckham Beauty, Clearstem, CosRx, Murad, 111Skin, and Youth To The People. These cleansers feature ingredients such as salicylic acid, apricot microspheres, and lactic acid and are designed to address various skin concerns such as acne, dryness, and uneven texture. Youth To The People released the Superfruit Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser.

articles.title: Apple Finally Brings Its App Store To The Web
articles.author: Yoni Heisler
articles.summary: Apple launched its App Store on the web, allowing users outside the iOS ecosystem to access it. The new website allows users to view app screenshots, read reviews, and watch demo videos. In 2024 alone, the App Store was responsible for more than $406 billion in developer billings and sales.

articles.title: I Tried Shake Shack's New Burger—and It Just One-Upped McDonald's
articles.author: Susan Choung
articles.summary: Shake Shack launched the Big Shack on November 4, which is a double-patty burger featuring Angus beef, special sauce, and a potato bun. Priced at $9.99, the Big Shack is positioned as a premium alternative to the McDonald's Big Mac, emphasizing higher-quality ingredients and a more substantial beef portion.

articles.title: Akii Launches the World's First Free AI Visibility Score
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Akii introduces a free AI visibility score. This score shows brands how top AI models perceive and rank their brand. Akii's platform aims to help businesses improve their standing in AI search.

articles.title: Apple Launches a Fresh New Look for the App Store on the Web
articles.author: John Quintet
articles.summary: Apple has launched a new web view for its App Store, allowing users to browse apps and categories via web browsers. The new web view includes tabs for Today, Games, Apps, and Arcade, as well as curated content and app details.

articles.title: OYO drops bonus issue plan, promises simplified shareholder structure
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: PRISM, the parent company of OYO, announced a new plan. This indicates a potential launch or introduction of a new product or service by OYO.

articles.title: Access the New Start Menu in Windows 11 Immediately without Waiting for a Draw
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft released a redesigned Start Menu for Windows 11 as part of the October 2023 update. The update promises increased space for pinned applications and a more adaptive layout, marking the first significant redesign since the initial launch of Windows 11. Users can access the new Start Menu via the optional update KB5067036 or by using the community-developed ViVeTool.

articles.title: Ivy Asia Liverpool prices including wagyu beef and £38 desserts
articles.author: Christopher Megrath
articles.summary: The Ivy Collection is launching a new restaurant concept, Ivy Asia, on November 4th, featuring exotic Asian dishes such as seared wagyu beef, sushi, and sashimi. The Ivy Asia Liverpool's menu offers various options, including set menus like the 'dragon set menu' and 'experience menu', and dishes that highlight seasonal ingredients and bold Asian flavors.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador thanks Australia's vote against US blockade (+Photo)
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: Apple has launched the iPhone 16, featuring a new A18 Bionic chip and an enhanced camera system. The device will be available in five colors and with storage options up to 1TB. Pre-orders begin on September 20th, with official sales starting on September 27th.

articles.title: MADFUN unleashed champions creativity, purpose, and empowerment with launch of 'Wear the Change' campaign
articles.summary: MADFUN Unleashed launched 'Wear the Change', a purpose-driven merchandise line where 20% of the proceeds will support community sports programs, mentorship initiatives, and empowerment projects. The collection debuts with MADFUN signature shorts designed for movement, performance, and lifestyle. The brand aims to build a community around shared values—creativity, fitness, inclusivity, and empowerment.

articles.title: This $400 Android phone with a paper-like display is boringly awesome - and I can't ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL has introduced the Nxtpaper 60 Ultra, a new product designed with a focus on eye comfort and stylus performance.

articles.title: Bigger, Bolder, Better: Papa Johns Redefines Pizza Night with The Grand Papa Pizza
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns launched The Grand Papa, its largest pizza ever, on November 3, 2025, in Atlanta.

articles.title: Domino's opens first-ever UK 'pod store' just off M5
articles.summary: Domino's has opened its first 'pod store' in the UK, located near the M5 motorway. This new store format represents a novel service delivery approach for the company within the UK market.

articles.title: No Makeup Makeup® Inaugurates the "Fragrance Essence" with No Fragrance Fragrance™Scent, Redefined™ Powered by FlexScent Technology™
articles.author: No Makeup Makeup
articles.summary: No Makeup Makeup introduces No Fragrance Fragrance, a new 'Fragrance Essence' designed to merge with the wearer's chemistry to create a unique scent. The product, conceived by Victoria Jackson and brought to life by Kim Wileman in collaboration with Givaudan's Custom Essence, is intended to be worn with the skin to enhance the wearer's natural essence.

articles.title: Several Dyson Vacuums Are on Sale for Black Friday Prices
articles.author: Sam Daly
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on its cordless vacuums, including the V11 and V11 Origin, both priced at $400, a $230 discount, and the V9 Motorbar for $270, which is over half off. These discounted models are available at retailers like Amazon and Best Buy, as well as directly from Dyson.

articles.title: Verizon Business and AWS accelerate AI applications at scale in a new fiber deal
articles.author: The Eagle-Tribune
articles.summary: Verizon Business launched Verizon AI on November 3, 2025.

articles.title: This underrated Windows feature is why my 512GB laptop still feels fast
articles.author: Pankil Shah
articles.summary: Windows offers Storage Sense, a feature designed to automatically manage storage space by cleaning up temporary files, emptying the Recycle Bin, and removing old files from the Downloads folder. Users can customize the settings to control how often Storage Sense runs and which areas it targets, ensuring optimal performance and efficient storage management. This feature aims to solve storage issues and improve PC performance.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Jar Opener Device (RKH-869)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed "ANNIES JAR OPENER," a new kitchen tool designed to easily open jars and bottles with minimal effort. The prototype is available for licensing or sale through InventHelp, targeting manufacturers or marketers.

articles.title: TCL Super Drum C682: Smarter, faster, healthier laundry solution
articles.summary: TCL, a global leader in TV and air conditioner sales, has launched the TCL Super Drum C682 washing machine in the Philippines. This new appliance features an extra-large drum, JetBubble technology for stain removal, and smart features like WiFi control via the TCL Home App. The C682 is designed to be an intelligent laundry solution that reduces water and energy consumption.

articles.title: 'AI is not a transformation project, it's an ongoing process'
articles.summary: Companies are integrating generative AI tools like Copilot, ChatGPT Teams, Claude, and Delos to improve productivity across departments like marketing, HR, and sales. More advanced companies are beginning to use agentic AI such as Nuwacom and AllMates.AI. The integration requires strategic support, governance, and addressing concerns related to security and misinformation to ensure successful and secure usage.

articles.title: Ulta Beauty's UB Marketplace And What It Means For Consumers And Brands
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Ulta Beauty launched UB Marketplace on October 14th. The Marketplace is meant to expand consumers' shopping experiences. It introduces new products from independent brands.

articles.title: Newark Advertiser readers can get free Christmas shopping vouchers for gifts, wine and travel
articles.summary: The Newark Advertiser is offering vouchers for products and services from various brands. These include discounts on Hello Fresh food boxes, Love Holidays trips, Regatta clothing, Morphy Richards appliances, and LookFantastic make-up products. The offers extend to gift items like Lego sets, HarperCollins books, and Kärcher garden tools, along with promotions on alcoholic beverages and gift sets.

articles.title: Naveck Technologies Empowers Startups and SMEs with Custom Software Development Solutions
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Naveck Technologies introduced a comprehensive suite of digital solutions designed for startups and SMEs. These services include custom software development, AI development, web development, mobile app development, web designing service, enterprise software solutions and cloud integration. The company aims to provide scalable and cost-effective technology solutions to empower businesses during digital transformation.

articles.title: Beyond ChatGPT: The Rise of Specialist AI Tools for Marketers
articles.summary: Elsa AI is introduced as a new domain-specific AI tool for marketing, contrasting with general AI like ChatGPT. It focuses on understanding marketing strategy, brand positioning, and buyer behavior to generate insights and improve campaign coherence. This tool promises to amplify marketers' capabilities by filling strategic gaps rather than just producing content.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 will pack new tech to take your mobile gaming experience to the next level
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing for the global launch of the OnePlus 15 on November 13. The flagship launch will also introduce new gaming improvements focused on smoothness, responsiveness, and immersion.

articles.title: Meet the Future of Skincare: Tech Activated Beauty Launches the First Lifting and Toning Sheet ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Tech Activated Beauty launched a collection of revolutionary beauty solutions. These solutions integrate science, technology, and design. The company aims to empower consumers to experience beauty in a new way.

articles.title: Coca-Cola's 'Festive' New Holiday Flavor Arrives Today: 'I Will Be Stockpiling'
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Coke is launching a new holiday-exclusive flavor. This marks the first new holiday-exclusive Coke flavor launch in five years.

articles.title: ZentLaw Leads the Next Era in Legal Services with Zent.AI
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: ZentLaw launched Zent.AI, an AI-native Alternative Legal Services Provider (AiLSP) platform. Zent.AI platform delivers agentic AI solutions and integrates with legal tools, offering optionality for legal teams. Zent.AI aims to streamline legal processes, expedite tasks, and offer cost-efficiency with security.

articles.title: Budget-Friendly Thanksgiving in NJ: Lidl Launches Meal Deal
articles.author: Michele Pilenza
articles.summary: Lidl is offering a Thanksgiving meal bundle for $10 less than last year, starting November 5th and running through November 26th. The bundle includes a Shady Brook Farms turkey and various Lidl-branded and other items, aiming to provide an affordable and accessible Thanksgiving feast for families.

articles.title: How to Develop a Successful SaaS Application: Guide for Founders
articles.summary: Binary Studio, a custom software development company, offers its expertise in building SaaS applications. The company specializes in ideation, MVP development, full-cycle custom software development, and dedicated development teams using technologies like Node.js, React Native, .NET, Flutter, and AI/ML integration to help companies launch successful SaaS products.

articles.title: Miggo Security Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition for Advancing Application Security Leadership
articles.author: frost.com
articles.summary: Miggo received the 2025 Global New Product Innovation Recognition from Frost & Sullivan for its Application Detection and Response (ADR) platform. This award acknowledges Miggo's innovative product differentiation and customer impact within the application security industry.

articles.title: NCS Technologies Launches Managed Device Lifecycle Services with AI-Ready HP Devices
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: NCS Technologies, Inc. launched its Managed Device Lifecycle Services (MDLS) offering in November 2025, featuring AI-ready HP devices. This service streamlines device management, reduces IT complexity, and allows businesses to shift to operating expenses. The MDLS solution, called Npoint, enables real-time co-management of every endpoint.

articles.title: Romanian PR Award 2025 își prezintă campaniile nominalizate
articles.author: Novac Dorina
articles.summary: The Romanian PR Award nominations include campaigns featuring new product and service launches. Samsung Romania's launch of the Galaxy Z Fold7 & Flip7 is recognized, as well as Freshful by eMAG's "Verde cu Freshful" and P&G's Pantene Hair Insurance. These nominations highlight creative and impactful PR strategies for introducing new offerings to the market.

articles.title: Roborock Invites Southern California Residents to Pet-Friendly "Pawp-Up" at Fashion Island
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock is hosting a "Pawp-Up" event to showcase its cleaning solutions designed for pet owners. The event will feature interactive zones where attendees can explore Roborock's innovative cleaning solutions, including the Saros Z70, Saros 10R, Qrevo CurvX, F25 Ultra, F25 RT, Q10 PF+, and the QR 798.

articles.title: Beyond Meat® Introduces New Value Pack of Its Latest Beyond Beef® at Retailers Across Canada
articles.author: Beyond Meat
articles.summary: Beyond Meat, Inc. launched its new Beyond Beef 2-Pack in Canada. This value pack offers a larger quantity of Beyond Beef and is available at major grocery chains, including Walmart and Loblaws. The product features simple ingredients, 18g of protein per serving, and a meaty flavor.

articles.title: Logan and Cove Pinnacle Hybrid Mattress review: Soft, supportive and affordable
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Canadian company GoodMorning.com launched the Logan & Cove Pinnacle Mattress, a luxury hybrid mattress. The Pinnacle offers more supportive foam and coils compared to the Logan & Cove Choice Mattress, including zoned support. It is vacuum-sealed, shipped in a box, and free shipping is available to most parts of Canada.

articles.title: Kingston FURY Adds Its Largest Capacity Client PCIe 5.0 NVMe SSD
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Kingston FURY, a division of Kingston Digital, Inc., has launched an 8TB full-capacity option for its Kingston FURY Renegade G5 SSD, targeting high-power users. The new SSD utilizes PCIe Gen5 x 4 controller and 3D TLC NAND, achieving speeds up to 14,800/14,000MB/s read/write and is available in capacities from 1024GB to 8192GB.

articles.title: Papa Johns Makes A 'Bold' Statement With Its New Menu: 'Bigger Is Better'
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Papa Johns has launched the Grand Papa Pizza, their largest pizza to date, featuring deli-style pepperoni and a three-cheese blend. In addition, they've introduced the Salted Caramel Blondie, a dessert bar with brown sugar, salted caramel chips, and sea salt. Both new offerings are currently available at participating locations through online orders or the Papa Johns app.

articles.title: The Laundry Lady: Award Winning Women Owned and Operated Business Launches in Canada
articles.author: The Laundry Lady
articles.summary: The Laundry Lady is launching its peer-to-peer mobile laundry service in Canada, specifically in Vancouver and Toronto in November 2025. This service allows customers to order cleaning, folding, and ironing with door-to-door service and offers flexible work opportunities for contractors, potentially earning $270-$2,700 CDN per week using the TimeBoss software platform.

articles.title: NEWEN AI Accelerates Delivery of Korean Market Insights with Generative AI Platform ‘Global Quettai'
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: NEWEN AI will launch 'Global Quettai' in early 2026, an English version of its AI analytics platform. The platform provides real-time insights into Korean market dynamics and consumer behavior by interpreting conversation flow and sentiment across digital channels. It aims to help foreign companies with market analysis and business insights in Korea.

articles.title: System1 Introduces Test Your Ad Competitive Edge, the Only Emotion-Driven Creative Intelligence Platform to Help Brands Shape Creative Strategy
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: System1 introduced Test Your Ad Competitive Edge, a large open database of creative effectiveness to give brands competitive advantage. The product allows marketers to rank and compare ads, predict impact, shape creative strategy, discover trends, track and report insights, and optimize creative.

articles.title: New ROG XG Mobile eGPU Brings Desktop-Class Power to Laptops and Handhelds
articles.author: ASUS Computer International
articles.summary: ASUS ROG has announced the launch of the 2025 ROG XG Mobile in Canada, a high-performance external GPU featuring NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 Ti or 5090 Laptop GPU options. The ROG XG Mobile starts shipping on November 3, 2025, and is available through the ASUS Store with prices starting at C$1,999 and C$3,499 respectively. The external GPU offers improved cooling, Thunderbolt 5 support, and compatibility with several ASUS and ROG laptops and handhelds.

articles.title: Roborock Invites Southern California Residents to Pet-Friendly "Pawp-Up" at Fashion Island
articles.summary: Roborock is launching its first pet-focused "Pawp-Up" event in Newport Beach to showcase cleaning solutions for pet owners and promote products like the Saros Z70, Saros 10R, Qrevo CurvX, F25 Ultra, F25 RT, Q10 PF+, and QR 798. Advantech introduces the AIR-055 edge AI system and AFE-A503 robotic controller, powered by the Qualcomm Dragonwing IQ-9075 processor, targeting applications in vision AI, robotics, and automation.

articles.title: Are We Ready For The Tidal Wave Of AI-Generated Video?
articles.author: Anjana Susarla
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Sora, a short-form AI video generation app, which achieved a million downloads within five days. Toys"R"Us created an animated brand film using OpenAI's Sora, which premiered at Cannes Lions 2024. Google and YouTube are embedding and pivoting to AI-generated video in ads and content creation, indicating the introduction of new services.

articles.title: Infosys Unveils Topaz Fabric: Revolutionizing Enterprise AI
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Infosys launched Infosys Topaz Fabric, a composable stack featuring AI agents, services, and models. Topaz Fabric's enterprise services cover IT operations, transformation services, quality engineering services, and cybersecurity. The platform allows enterprises to easily access integrated and modular services through a unified interface, boosting efficiency and innovation.

articles.title: KFC finally launches 'secret' menu item across Australia - but you'll have to be quick: 'A match made in heaven'
articles.author: SHARON HUNT
articles.summary: KFC Australia launched the Zinger Bánh Mì, a new menu item, nationwide on November 4th. The Zinger Bánh Mì, inspired by the Vietnamese baguette, features a spicy Zinger fillet, vibrant slaw, fresh chillies, and special sauces in a bread roll, available at selected KFC restaurants starting at $9.95 until December 1st.

articles.title: 28 Over-Achieving Products Reviewers Say They'll Use 'Forever'
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Secret introduces a clinical-strength deodorant providing 72 hours of sweat and odor protection. Additionally, brands offer a long-lasting mascara for bold lashes and a natural nail and cuticle repair oil for stronger nails and softer cuticles.

articles.title: Nework Brings Entertainment Everywhere with Battery-Powered Portable TV Early Bird Promotion
articles.author: NEWORK LLC
articles.summary: Nework has launched the MoveMate AI 27' Portable TV, a battery-powered smart TV with Google AI Gemini integration. It features a 27' FHD touch display, 16-hour battery life, and smart home integration, designed for entertainment, remote work, and home learning. It is offered at an Early Bird discount of 20% off from October 20 to November 15, 2025.

articles.title: Here Are 33 Products That'll Help You Be More Efficient
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new products designed to simplify daily tasks, including a rapid cold brew maker, a hands-free shower spray, and a Roomba robot vacuum. Other notable items include a breakfast sandwich maker, a pet hair roller, and a chicken shredder, all aimed at enhancing convenience and efficiency in the kitchen and home.

articles.title: 2026 BYD Sealion 8 review: Quick drive
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: BYD is launching a large number of new products in Australia, expanding into new market segments.

articles.title: LaptopHunter LLC Introduces Two Cutting-Edge Services: AI-Powered Laptop Suggestions and Quantum Comparison Tool
articles.summary: LaptopHunter LLC has launched AI-Powered Custom & Personal Laptop Suggestions, which provides personalized laptop recommendations based on user needs and Quantum Laptop Comparison Tool, which offers multi-factor analysis for detailed comparisons. These new services aim to simplify the laptop shopping experience by providing meaningful insights and efficient analysis.

articles.title: Redmagic's liquid-cooled gaming phone starts at $749
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Redmagic is launching the Redmagic 11 Pro worldwide later this month, including in the US, starting at $749. This phone features true liquid cooling, supplemented by a waterproof fan, liquid metal cooling for the CPU, and a vapor chamber. The phone goes on sale direct from Redmagic on November 19th.

articles.title: Boring always-on displays are history: Android 17 will let apps show controls on your phone's idle screen
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Google's Android 17 is set to launch with a 'Min Mode' feature, which reinvents the always-on display. This update allows apps to bring minimalist, functional interfaces to the phone's darkened screen, enabling users to access essential features like navigation or music controls without fully unlocking the device. Google Maps will be among the first apps to utilize this feature, displaying simple monochrome directions.

articles.title: We tasted the new products on the shelves
articles.summary: Achva is launching Middle Eastern cookies. The launch is positioned as a significant event.

articles.title: 30 Cleaning Items For Thorough, Immediate Results
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of cleaning products, including a pressure washer, de-matting brush, electric spin scrubber, and food-grade mineral oil, each designed for specific cleaning tasks. Additionally, products like Pink Miracle shoe cleaner, window track cleaning brush, rechargeable air blaster, wood polish, vinyl record cleaning kit, solvent-based cleaner, silver polishing wipes, microfiber cleaning cloth, microfiber mop pads, Goo Gone, dishwasher cleaning tablets, steam cleaner, leather stain remover, The Pink Stuff cleaning paste, soft cleanser, Baseboard Buddy, cleaning wipes, pumice stone, makeup brush shampoo, brush spinner, squeegee broom, window screen brush, automatic scrubbing brush, microfiber duster, stainless steel cleaner, and Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator are mentioned, providing solutions for a comprehensive range of cleaning needs.

articles.title: Park Avenue Scores $1.99 Smashburgers as Campus Burgers Lands in the Rose Garden
articles.author: Bay Life Tv
articles.summary: Campus Burgers has opened a new location on Park Avenue in San Jose, offering an ultra-low-price menu including $1.99 hamburgers and $2.99 cheeseburgers. The Park Ave location also offers options for pickup, delivery via DoorDash, and digital gift cards, and early feedback is around 4.0/5 based on customer reviews.

articles.title: There's only one good reason to upgrade an old Kindle and its not screen size
articles.author: Eli Becht
articles.summary: The author expresses a desire to upgrade to a newer Kindle model primarily for the USB-C charging port, as opposed to the micro-USB port on older models. Newer Kindle models have adopted USB-C, offering convenience by using the same cables for other devices.

articles.title: I Bet You Won't Make It Through All 37 TikTok-Approved Items Without Adding One To Your Cart
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: A new IP44 waterproof certified shower lamp has been introduced. The lamp features a dimming function and emits a warm light. Early reviews suggest it creates a nice ambiance in the shower and bathroom and can be used as a warm light at any place.

articles.title: Stourport Tesco on Severn Road new laundry kiosk approved
articles.author: Lauren Chaloner
articles.summary: Tesco Stores Ltd and Johnsons received approval to install a Johnson's Laundry Kiosk at the Tesco superstore on Severn Road. This kiosk will offer customers a self-service laundry option at their local superstore. The kiosk will feature Johnson's Specialist Cleaning branding and operating instructions.

articles.title: Ranveer Singh's protein brand — eyeing Rs 500 cr in 5 years — is taste-tested by his family, was pitched the idea on a basketball court and via GIFs
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Ranveer Singh's co-founded brand, SuperYou, has launched.

articles.title: Next's £16 wide leg trousers 'smart enough for work or going out'
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: Next offers the Set Black 2 Pack Wide Leg Trousers for £32, available in sizes 8 to 20. The wide leg trousers are described as comfortable and stylish. M&S offers Jersey Wide Leg Trousers with Stretch for £19.50, and New Look offers Black Brushed Ribbed Wide Leg Trousers for £19.99.

articles.title: M&S' 'cosy' £36 fleece jacket is warm yet 'soft and super comfortable'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer offers the Borg Funnel Neck Half Zip Sweatshirt (£36) and the Supersoft Crew Neck Jumper (£18). Tu features the Quarter Zip Borg Fleece Jumper (£22.50). H&M provides the Zip-Top Teddy Sweatshirt for £17.99, each with different color options and features.

articles.title: This AI Pantry Challenge is Taking Over TikTok and Rescuing Grocery Budgets
articles.author: Anna Chesley
articles.summary: TikTok users are utilizing ChatGPT to create meal plans based on existing fridge and pantry ingredients. By providing ChatGPT with a list or photo of available food items, users receive meal suggestions that help reduce grocery bills and food waste, making it a cost-effective solution for budget-conscious individuals.

articles.title: 9 creative prompts to unlock your best ideas in ChatGP — straight from OpenAI's top‑100 list
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT can be utilized for various creative tasks by using specific prompts.  These prompts include visualizing concepts, challenging thinking, finding the right word, creating visual prototypes, brainstorming, turning ideas into action, self-discovery, matching mood and getting motivated. By utilizing these prompts, users can leverage ChatGPT to unlock creativity.

articles.title: 25 Magical 'Internet Famous' Products From Amazon
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Amazon curates an "Internet Famous" section featuring TikTok-viral products. La Roche-Posay offers Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer. Bartesian offers Premium Cocktail and Margarita Machine. JBL releases Go 3 speaker.

articles.title: I tried a $400 Android phone that looks dull on paper, and I couldn't put ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL has introduced the Nxtpaper 60 Ultra. This device prioritizes eye comfort and stylus performance.

articles.title: CUSTA Renews Platform with 4,000-Item Catalogue and Unlimited Customisation, First of Its Kind in Singapore at Scale  Nov. 3, 2025 09:24
articles.summary: CUSTA has announced a full-scale service renewal for Singapore customers, featuring a doubled product catalog of 4,000 items, unlimited customization combinations, and instant pricing and lead-time features. To celebrate its 2nd anniversary, CUSTA launched the "CUSTA Service Renewal Campaign" with a 10% discount using the promo code NEWCUSTA and free design support for orders above SGD 100 until 30 November 2025.

articles.title: Nissan powers up Japan Mobility Show 2025 with Icons and EV Innovation
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Nissan unveiled a strategically curated lineup. This action is aimed at energizing its domestic market presence, indicating the introduction of new products or service offerings by Nissan.

articles.title: CityDrinks Marks Two Years as UAE's Leading Online Alcohol Retailer
articles.summary: CityDrinks, celebrating its second anniversary, has launched Genie the Sommelier, an AI-driven innovation that offers personalized beer, wine, and spirits recommendations to customers in multiple languages. This launch is part of CityDrinks' expansion plans, which include enhanced AI-driven personalization features.

articles.title: Meta Launches CMO Alex Schultz's Book ‘Click Here: The Art & Science of Digital Marketing & Advertising'
articles.author: Ht Syndication
articles.summary: Meta has launched "Click Here: The Art and Science of Digital Marketing and Advertising," a book authored by Alex Schultz. The book aims to provide marketers, entrepreneurs, and business leaders with practical insights and guiding principles for succeeding in the digital marketing landscape, covering topics from marketing funnels to AI tools.

articles.title: Samyang returns to roots with revival of Korea's 1st instant noodle recipe
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samyang Foods launched a new instant noodle product on Monday. This product revives beef tallow, a key ingredient of the company's first ramyeon product, Samyang Ramen.

articles.title: Front-load washing machines that fight hard water, stains and pollution dirt, starting at ₹20,000
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article introduces new front-load washing machine models from brands like Godrej, LG, Bosch, Samsung, and IFB, available on Amazon with discounts. These models feature technologies like Steam Wash, AI fabric detection, and EcoBubble for efficient cleaning and energy saving.

articles.title: 32 Lovely Products To Make Your Life Feel More Like A Fairy Tale
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of newly available products ranging from personal care like the Wild Iris Musk Body Wash and the "Soft" perfume rollerball, to home goods such as the Anthropologie-inspired reversible quilted throw blanket, vintage-style botanical wall art prints and the hummingbird lamp. Other products include fashion accessories like hair clips, jewelry catch-alls and the ruffle-hemmed shower curtain, as well as functional items such as the cloud-shaped utility knife and flower-shaped pill organizer.

articles.title: The latest hygiene product that you can put anywhere. Yes, even there
articles.author: Seaman
articles.summary: Rexona, among other companies, is introducing whole-body deodorants in spray, stick, and cream formulas to mask odors from various body parts. The deodorant market is projected to reach $603 million this year. These products aim to provide 'fresh' and 'clean' odor protection for areas like feet, thighs, breasts, testicles, and vulvas.

articles.title: The latest hygiene product that you can put anywhere. Yes, even there
articles.author: Seaman
articles.summary: Rexona has launched a whole-body deodorant, advertised with a commercial featuring Martha Stewart. This new type of product aims to provide odour protection for various body parts, including feet, thighs, and groin areas.

articles.title: CityDrinks Marks Two Years as UAE's Leading Online Alcohol Retailer
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: CityDrinks, the UAE's largest online alcohol retailer, is celebrating its second anniversary. CityDrinks has launched Genie, the AI Sommelier, which offers personalized beer, wine & spirits recommendations to customers. The company also reports record growth and expanded product offerings.

articles.title: Niche Confectionery Ghana launches DailyMilk, a flavoured milk drink
articles.summary: Niche Confectionery Ghana, a subsidiary of Niche Cocoa Industry Limited, has launched DailyMilk, a new flavored and nutritious milk drink. DailyMilk is available in strawberry, banana, and vanilla flavors and is being marketed as a healthy alternative to soft drinks. It is available in malls, schools, supermarkets, convenience stores and retail outlets across the country.

articles.title: Geekvape SOUL II Wins 2025 MUSE Gold Award - A Testament to Strength and Innovation
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Geekvape's SOUL II vaping device has won the 2025 MUSE Design Gold Award. The device is a fusion of style and practicality with interchangeable mouthpieces, a magnetic pod system, and a visible e-liquid window, designed to provide users a superior vaping experience.

articles.title: Lenskart Ventures into Vision-Tech with AI-Powered Smart Glasses Launch
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Lenskart plans to launch its first AI-powered smart glasses, 'B by Lenskart Smartglasses,' by the end of December, aiming to become a technology-oriented lifestyle brand. The smart glasses will feature AI-based functionalities, health and well-being insights, and UPI payment integration, and are powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon AR1 Gen 1 platform.

articles.title: LG expands AI adoption, partners EcoBank
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria launched a new range of AI-powered Smart TVs, including OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models, powered by LG ThinQ AI. In partnership with Ecobank Nigeria, LG introduced an Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) Scheme, facilitating customer purchases of LG Smart TVs and home appliances through flexible payments.

articles.title: The Sugar Liquidation Sale is on in New Campaign from Long White
articles.author: Apac Ad Junkie
articles.summary: Long White has launched 'X by Long White,' a new sugar-free sub-range in New Zealand. Asahi Beverages NZ is supporting the launch with a national campaign, featuring a fictional 'Gary's Sugar Liquidation Sale' to humorously address the removal of sugar from the new product.

articles.title: Samyang returns to roots with revival of Korea's first instant noodle recipe
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samyang Foods launched a new instant noodle, Samyang Ramyun, reviving the original recipe using beef tallow. This ingredient previously caused sales decline due to public backlash in 1989.

articles.title: 2025 Mini Cooper 2-Door: Small car with big heart
articles.author: Grant Miller
articles.summary: Mini is launching the 2025 Mini Cooper, a redesigned version of its classic car. The new model features a sleeker design, a 9.4-inch OLED display with the OS 9 operating system, and updated technology and safety features. The base model starts at $30,000, while the convertible version begins at over $40,000.

articles.title: Plant vs Zombie 3 Download Free Full Version for Android & PC (Latest 2025)
articles.author: Tim Jurnal Ngawi
articles.summary: EA, along with PopCap, launched Plants vs Zombies 3, a new version of the tower defense game. This version features 3D graphics, smoother gameplay, and an upgraded strategic system. It also includes a new art style, improved combat system, and online connectivity for updates.

articles.title: 28 "Uncool" Products Under $25 That Will *Probably* Change Your Life
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Monday Haircare introduces a dry shampoo designed to extend the life of freshly washed hair, providing volume without residue. PanOxyl launches a gentler Acne Creamy Wash with acne-fighting ingredients. Liquid I.V. offers electrolyte drink mixes packed with vitamins and nutrients for quick hydration. The Pink Stuff, a cleaning paste, is introduced for removing grime from various surfaces.

articles.title: LG Ad Solutions unveils Agentiv to transform workflows with artificial intelligence
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 03
articles.summary: LG Ad Solutions launched Agentiv, an AI platform designed to enhance advertising technology operations and data management. The company plans to begin beta testing of Agentiv with selected advertisers, starting with a data collaboration agent to combine customer data with LG Ad Solutions' insights. Agentiv supports various operational workflows, including media planning and creative review, and provides features like natural language query and clean room integration.

articles.title: DXN, Selasih Aman launch Lingzhi-enriched eggs
articles.author: Faiqah Kamaruddin
articles.summary: DXN Holdings Bhd, in partnership with Selasih Aman Sdn Bhd, launched the DXN Lingzhi Egg, a functional food product. DXN also introduced DXN Butter Cookies, developed in collaboration with Global Premium Resources Sdn Bhd. These launches expand DXN's functional food portfolio.

articles.title: T-Mobile Distributes Free Beanies: How to Claim Yours
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: T-Mobile is giving away free beanies to its customers through the T-Mobile Tuesdays app. Customers with T-Mobile, Sprint, and Metro by T-Mobile postpaid accounts are eligible, and they can claim the beanie by downloading the app and following the instructions within the 'T-Mobile Tuesdays' offer section.

articles.title: Best smart lock
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The article reviews and recommends various smart locks, highlighting features like keypad entry, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, biometric access, and auto-locking. It mentions specific models offering key codes, remote access, and integration with home hubs, while noting considerations such as price, compatibility, and additional hardware requirements. The listed prices for these products are between $60 and $300.

articles.title: Free AI Girlfriend Chat That Actually Feels Intimate: How My Dream Companion Gets It Right
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: My Dream Companion introduces a free AI girlfriend chat platform that allows users to build AI companions with layered personality traits and customizable appearances. Users can engage in flirty texts, receive AI-generated images, and experience emotionally intelligent conversations that evolve over time without upfront payment. The service offers layered immersive experiences that tap into visuals and voice, including a growing video generation feature that adds another level of realism.

articles.title: 23 Best Lip Balms
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new lip balms. Nivea offers vegan tinted lip balms. Laneige is launching a Lip Glowy Balm with murumuru and shea butter. Glossier is introducing Balm Dotcom in a limited edition "Banana Pudding" flavor.

articles.title: A glimpse of humanoid robots in Shenzhen, China's Guangdong
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: EngineAI, a robotic startup, has created a humanoid robot. This robot is being showcased at a robot 6S store in Shenzhen, Guangdong Province, China.

articles.title: Getting Premium Cannabis Delivery in SoCal: The Lucky Farms Promise
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Lucky Farms, based in Southern California, provides cannabis delivery services, offering premium flower, edibles, vapes, and concentrates. The company emphasizes transparency, high standards, and local service, with a focus on product quality and service assurance. Customers can order online, choosing from a menu of products and delivery options.

articles.title: Launch of Samyang 1963 instant noodles
articles.author: Nam
articles.summary: Samyang Foods Inc. launched Samyang 1963, a new instant noodle product featuring beef tallow, at a publicity event in Seoul on November 3, 2025. Kim Jung-soo, vice chief of Samyang Foods Inc., attended the launch event.

articles.title: CUSTA Renews Platform with 4,000-Item Catalogue and Unlimited Customisation, First of Its Kind in Singapore at Scale
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: CUSTA has launched a renewed version of its customisation e-commerce platform in Singapore, featuring an upgraded service. The upgrade doubles its catalogue to 4,000 products, introduces unlimited customisation combinations, and integrates instant best-price and lead-time features, replacing legacy processes. To mark its 2nd anniversary, CUSTA has launched the "CUSTA Service Renewal Campaign", running until 30 November 2025.

articles.title: The Most Flavorful Canned Tuna Is Packed With A Little Something Extra
articles.author: Alexandra Fay
articles.summary: StarKist offers Chunk Light Tuna in Water with the addition of vegetable broth. This update adds a savory backbone and umami to the tuna, enhancing the flavor for various uses. The product is also positioned as a higher-protein lunch option that doesn't compromise on taste.

articles.title: Long White rolls out X by Long White with ‘Gary's Sugar Liquidation Sale' campaign
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Long White, an RTD brand by Asahi Beverages NZ, has launched a new sugar-free sub-range called 'X by Long White'. The launch is supported by a campaign called 'THAT'S UNXPECTED', created in partnership with Droga5 ANZ, and features a sugar liquidation sale.

articles.title: I took the OnePlus 15 camera on a photo walk and clicked some good memories
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its new flagship phone internationally. The phone features a fast OLED screen, significant battery technology improvements, and powerful performance. This launch marks the end of the Hasselblad camera partnership.

articles.title: Honda Elevate ADV edition launched in India: Bolder design, advanced features & price
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Honda Cars India launched the new Elevate ADV Edition.

articles.title: NEWEN AI Accelerates Delivery of Korean Market Insights with Generative AI Platform ‘Global Quettai'
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NEWEN AI will launch 'Global Quettai', an English AI analytics platform. This platform offers real-time insights into Korean market trends and consumer behavior.

articles.title: TMK improves pipe corrosion protection
articles.author: Kallanish Commodities
articles.summary: TMK's Pervouralsk Novotrubny Plant (PNTZ) has begun applying a new type of coating. This coating is designed to protect the external surface of pipes used in aggressive environments during oil and gas production.

articles.title: New ROG XG Mobile eGPU Brings Desktop-Class Power to Laptops and Handhelds
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ROG has introduced a new external GPU in Canada. The new ROG external GPU features Thunderbolt 5 and up to an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5090 Laptop GPU. The product boasts improved cooling for enhanced portable performance.

articles.title: TELLCAN Food Science Co., Ltd. Focuses on Innovation Trends in Sugar-Free Tea Beverages, Empowering the ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Yili Group's brand 'Yike Live Spring' launched the 'freshly brewed tea' series. The product utilizes 'tea-water separation + freeze-dried extraction' technology. This launch aims to differentiate itself in the sugar-free tea beverage market.
